channel.title: Hazrul Azhar Jamari on Hazrul Azhar Jamari. Technopreneur based in Singapore.
channel.description: Recent content in Hazrul Azhar Jamari on Hazrul Azhar Jamari. Technopreneur based in Singapore.

item.title: Tech Community
item.description: Speak WordCamp Singapore 2017 How WooCommerce is being disrupted by Shopify. BarCamp JB 2015 How to sell online faster by not building a website. BarCamp Singapore 2011 Growth of WordPress 2011. WordCamp Singapore 2011 Building a collaborative user network for Open Source WordPress in Asia. Volunteer Singapore WordPress User Group, 2010 - 2011 Lead Co-Founder of WordPress User Group organising bi-monthly meetups. partnering with the NLB and co-working spaces. Today, I attend meetups occasionally as a regular member.

item.title: Foodie
item.description: I’m an avid foodie and post daily on Instagram/@haz_daily and Facebook/@hazdaily. Sometimes, I give my honest reviews on restaurants I visit on Instagram/@honesthalalreviews and Facebook/@honesthalalreviews. < Back

item.title: Family Man
item.description: I’m married to Farah Nadia, a passionate educator in the Singapore Civil Service. Together, we are cat parents to rescue cats Rachael, Shiro and Abu. < Back
